servinfo.title: DTC P0601 / P0602 / P0607: Internal Control Module Memory Check Sum Error / Control Module Programming Error / Control Module Performance

servinfosub.title: System Description
servinfosub.ptxt: Internal control module is installed in ECM.

servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

entry.ptxt: Data write error or check sum error

s1.ptxt: Connect scan tool to DLC with ignition switch turned OFF.
Turn ON ignition switch and clear DTC, pending DTC and freeze frame data by using scan tool.
Start engine and run it at idle if possible.
Check DTC and pending DTC by using scan tool.

attention3.ptxt: Before this trouble shooting is performed, read the precautions for DTC troubleshooting referring to Precautions For DTC Troubleshooting .

testgroup.title: DTC recheck

test1.ptxt: Clear DTC referring to DTC Clearance .
Turn ON ignition switch and check DTC.

testgroup.question: Is DTC P0601 or P0607 still indicated?

paragroup.ptxt: Check for intermittent referring to Intermittent and Poor Connection Inspection

testgroup.title: ECM power and ground circuit check

test1.ptxt: Check that ECM power supply circuit and ECM ground circuit is in good condition referring to ECM Power and Ground Circuit Check .

testgroup.question: Are check results OK?

action.ptxt: Substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.
Repair ECM power or ground circuit.
